name: Rhianna & Luciella
loreDescription: You're today's target. I'll let you know now that there's nowhere to run.

skillDescription.base: 10.0% chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the turn. Can be activated once per turn.
skillDescription.max: 20.0% chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the turn. Can be activated once per turn.
